subject: pedal calibration not working
description_text:
Hy there,

I just received my pedals and am struggling to get them working. in the
calibration tool it says device disconnected, in simsonn manager the
throttle reads 0 input when fully pressed and i cant use them in any game.

If there is any way you can get back to me so i can fix this i would
greatly appreciate that! Is there anyone that can help me set the pedals up
to work?

best regards,
Jordy D.W.

Hi Jordy De Wit,    We apologize, but our engineer is currently addressing a critical issue. We will have him contact you as soon as possible to resolve the matter.

Hi Jordy De Wit,       Launch the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2.    On the “Plus X” control unit, press and hold the “Upgrade” button.    While holding the button, unplug the USB cable from the PC and then plug it back in. The software should detect the device entering “SIMSONN Flasher update mode”.    In the software go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update.    In the file selector choose: pedals‑firmware → pedals‑plusx.sfu.    Click “Start Update” and wait until the firmware is completely written. During this process do not disconnect the USB or close the application.    Once the update is finished (you’ll get a success prompt or the unit will reboot), unplug and re‑plug the USB then test the pedal device to confirm everything works correctly.
